broadcast().notice: Chapter 1: calls MaxExtract.broadcast() and stores the returned sectorId. Requirements: - Must be triggered by the same account that bought into the game. - Enforced by requiring tx.origin == owner and msg.sender == owner (direct EOA call).

owner().notice: The buy-in EOA that deployed this registry (must match tx.origin in protocol flow)

sectorIdFromCore().notice: Convenience: read sector directly from MaxExtract mapping (helps debugging)

setModule(string,address).notice: Add/replace a module contract address (credentials, staking, fuel, etc.)

updateRegistryOnMaxExtract().notice: If you deploy a NEW registry later, call this from the NEW registry (spec mentions updateRegistry()). This wrapper exists so you can update via the registry itself.
